::KitKat::

She turned her head as her fired, missing her head.  She raised her 
rifle and aimed at Testifier,"GO AWAY! I SAID I"D TELL YOU EVERYTHING 
WHEN THIS FIGHT WAS OVER WITH!"  She fell to her knees and felt 
really light headed.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Testifier growled.
> 
> "You shall feel her pain." Testifier said. He fired at KitKat but 
pulled the
> rifle up at the last second, the shot missing.
> 
> "That was a warning shot, but you shall die for your treachery." 
Testifier
> said...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>

> Subject: Re: A final word
> 
> 
> >
> > ::KitKat::
> >
> > She lay there in wolf mode, leaking and covered in mech fluid.  
She
> > started to spit up fluid.  She found out just how much she hated 
the
> > taste of mech fluid.  She looked up at Testifier, who had a gun
> > pointed at her.  She spoke in a soft voice and her breathing 
became
> > more labored. "She is dead.  She walked over to the maximals and
> > surrendered.  They were.  "she breaths for a moment," they were 
going
> > to torture her.  They were going to make her suffer in ways
> > unmaginable."she breaths and couchs," I couldn't let them do that 
to
> > my friend.  I couldn't let them hurt her.  I wasn't going to let 
them
> > cause her any more pain." She starts to cry and whine in wolf
> > mode. "Time Bomb had died.  We had lost a friend, but she had her
> > spark broken.  The Maximals attacked and demanded her.  I tried to
> > save her, but she sacrificed herself over to them. "coughs and 
spits
> > up some more mech fluid. "they were going to torture her and make 
her
> > suffer.  They wanted her to know pain in ways that are unknown to
> > Predacon.  I will kill an enemy, never torture. "she groans in 
pain
> > and agony."I couldn't let that happen. She was my friend.  I cared
> > for her like a little sister.  She was my friend.  I tried to save
> > her.  I tried.  Then she sacraficed her self and left me with no
> > choice.  They were going to torture her.  I had no choice. No 
choice.
> > I had to do it.  It was the only way.  I couldn't let her suffer."
> > She groaned and transformed into bot mode. She grabbed at her 
belly
> > and doubled over in pain.  She got up on her knees and looked at 
all
> > the holes in her body.  She closed her eyes and hoped she could 
get
> > to a CR chamber soon.
